content.text: Now let me create the comprehensive CI/CD workflows:

input.content:
name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [main, develop]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main, develop]

jobs:
  test-server:
    name: Test Server
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '20'
          cache: 'npm'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Run server tests
        run: npm run test -w server

      - name: Generate coverage report
        run: npm run test -w server -- --coverage

      - name: Upload coverage to Codecov
        uses: codecov/codecov-action@v4
        with:
          files: ./server/coverage/coverage-final.json
          flags: server
          name: server-coverage
        env:
          CODECOV_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.CODECOV_TOKEN }}

  test-client:
    name: Test Client Build
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '20'
          cache: 'npm'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Build client
        run: npm run build -w client

      # TODO: Add client tests when available
      # - name: Run client tests
      #   run: npm run test -w client

  lint:
    name: Lint & Type Check
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '20'
          cache: 'npm'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Type check server
        run: npm run build -w server

      - name: Type check client
        run: npm run build -w client

  quality-gate:
    name: Quality Gate
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: [test-server, test-client, lint]
    if: always()

    steps:
      - name: Check all jobs passed
        run: |
          if [[ "${{ needs.test-server.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
             [[ "${{ needs.test-client.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
             [[ "${{ needs.lint.result }}" != "success" ]]; then
            echo "Quality gate failed - one or more checks did not pass"
            exit 1
          fi
          echo "Quality gate passed - all checks successful"

tool_use_result.content:
name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [main, develop]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main, develop]

jobs:
  test-server:
    name: Test Server
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '20'
          cache: 'npm'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Run server tests
        run: npm run test -w server

      - name: Generate coverage report
        run: npm run test -w server -- --coverage

      - name: Upload coverage to Codecov
        uses: codecov/codecov-action@v4
        with:
          files: ./server/coverage/coverage-final.json
          flags: server
          name: server-coverage
        env:
          CODECOV_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.CODECOV_TOKEN }}

  test-client:
    name: Test Client Build
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '20'
          cache: 'npm'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Build client
        run: npm run build -w client

      # TODO: Add client tests when available
      # - name: Run client tests
      #   run: npm run test -w client

  lint:
    name: Lint & Type Check
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '20'
          cache: 'npm'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Type check server
        run: npm run build -w server

      - name: Type check client
        run: npm run build -w client

  quality-gate:
    name: Quality Gate
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: [test-server, test-client, lint]
    if: always()

    steps:
      - name: Check all jobs passed
        run: |
          if [[ "${{ needs.test-server.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
             [[ "${{ needs.test-client.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
             [[ "${{ needs.lint.result }}" != "success" ]]; then
            echo "Quality gate failed - one or more checks did not pass"
            exit 1
          fi
          echo "Quality gate passed - all checks successful"
